Reviews.Title: “Bed BUGS!!!”

Reviews.Content: sister checked hotel towards week june location previous hotel south ealing decided residing hotel nearer city centre decision cost painfully time begin whats hotel owners hospitality location located short 34 mins walk russell tube station piccadilly line location hotel coffee cheap reasonably chinese restaurant supermarket couple mins walk ure walk kings cross map course isnt bad reasons wouldnt recommend friend traveling bed bug infestation reviews bed bug infestation pretty accurate night sis covered bite bugs sis arrived scandinavian traveling approximately 3 weeks prior arrival london claim bed bugs brought wasnt accurate mites bugs werent hidden killed couple skin night 4th night change realized bugs bed carpeted floor clothes purchased couple lack internet access proper breakfast added negative impression shifted hotel decided hotel till trip id recommend staying hotel ur stay london couple hotels stretch road goodwood hotel etc strongly suggest check committing hotel
